pr_title: XRDDEV-873 Load internal tls key cert

timeline.message:
XRDDEV-873 Internal key cache and get

* adds InternalSSLKey caching in CachingServerConfImpl
XRDDEV-873 Internal key cache and get // lower default cache time
XRDDEV-873 Internal key cache and get // update docs
XRDDEV-873 Internal key cache and get // change constructor
XRDDEV-873 Internal key cache and get // update docs 2

timeline.bodyText: This annotation is unnecessary (If a class contains no constructors, then a default no-args constructor is implicitly declared)
timeline.author: jhyoty
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -41,16 +42,14 @@
 /**
  * a KeyManager that holds the internal SSL Key
  */
-@RequiredArgsConstructor
+@NoArgsConstructor

timeline.bodyText: Setting server-conf-cache-period to zero disables all serverconf caching, in which case this setting has no effect. Is it really necessary to have a separate cache period for the internal key?
timeline.author: jhyoty

replies.bodyText: These now use the same cache period: proxy.server-conf-cache-period which is 60 seconds by default. Also updated documentation accordingly
replies.author: carohauta

timeline.message: XRDDEV-873 Remove separate cache period for Internal Key
